content.text: Hey, I'm a bit down today. Can we talk about what's making me sad?
Sure, I'm here for you. What's going on?
My dog Tiki died a few days ago, and I'm really missing her.
I'm so sorry to hear that. Losing a pet is never easy.
Thanks. She was my best friend.
It's good that you had her in your life. I'm sure she was happy to have you as her owner.
Yeah, I like to think so.
What kind of dog was she?
A golden retriever. She was the sweetest dog ever.
Golden retrievers are the best dogs. I've had two of them in my lifetime.
I'm glad you've had the chance to experience their love.
They're so loving and loyal. I'm sure Tiki was the same way.
She was. She was always there for me, no matter what.
I'm really sorry for your loss. I can only imagine how hard it must be for you.
Thanks. It's been tough, but I'm trying to get through it.
I'm here for you if you need anything.
